## StringEncoding.system property

The default [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) used by the operating system when it creates strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly system: StringEncoding;
```

## Remarks

This uses the Core Foundation function [CFStringGetSystemEncoding](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/1541720-cfstringgetsystemencoding?language=objc)<!-- -->.
